p: Generally, nanocarriers are divided into organic-based (polymeric and lipid-based NPs such as nanoemulsions or liposomes), inorganic-based (including metallic nanostructures, e.g., quantum dots), or a combination of both [ 4]. Numerous natural and synthetic polymers are suitable for electrospraying/electrospinning processes. Nevertheless, only “generally recognized as safe” (GRAS) components are permitted for foods [ 40].
